name: thin
description: Builds and runs thin packager (core flow, runtime + integrity).
fail_hint: Check toolchain (cc/pkg-config/libzstd) and thin build logs.

name: thin-anti-debug
description: Validates anti-debug and hardening probes around thin runtime.
fail_hint: Check ptrace/perf/bpf tooling and strict env flags.

name: legacy-packagers
description: Covers legacy packagers (bundle/SEA) compatibility and runtime.
fail_hint: Check postject/SEA tooling and packager availability.

name: compat
description: Checks packager compatibility (sentinel/strip/elfPacker) via config explain.
fail_hint: Verify config explain output and packager gating.

name: completion
description: Checks CLI bash completion output and target discovery.
fail_hint: Check bash availability and completion script output.

name: user-flow
fail_hint: Check SSH/systemd readiness and example workspace.

name: sentinel
description: Verifies sentinel install/verify paths and hardware IDs.
fail_hint: Check root access, /etc/machine-id, and host device IDs.

name: protection
fail_hint: Check kernel/ptrace settings and protection config.

name: obfuscation
description: Tests JS/C obfuscation pipeline and runtime behavior.
fail_hint: Check obfuscator tools and build logs.

name: strip
description: Verifies strip/ELF cleanup rules and runtime smoke.
fail_hint: Check strip tool and ELF expectations.

name: c-obfuscators
description: Tests C obfuscator variants and runtime checks.
fail_hint: Check C++ toolchain and obfuscator binaries.

name: postject
description: Ensures postject/SEA injection workflow is functional.
fail_hint: Check postject availability and SEA metadata.

name: example-ui
fail_hint: Check Playwright browsers and port availability.

name: decoy
description: Validates decoy file installation and collision handling.
fail_hint: Check decoy config and output integrity.

name: ship
fail_hint: Check SSH, sudo, and target config.
